Report.name: BoxMaintenanceReport
Report.description: This report provides information about box maintenance activities and status.

Report.name: BundleTrackingReport
Report.description: This report tracks bundles through various stages of the production process.

Report.name: MachineDetailsReport
Report.description: This report provides detailed information about machine utilization and status.

Report.name: OperationWise480Mins
Report.description: This report provides operation-wise analysis over an 8-hour (480 minutes) period.

Report.name: OperationWiseMissing
Report.description: This report identifies missing operations in the production workflow.

Report.name: OperationWiseScanning
Report.description: This report analyzes scanning data by operation.

Report.name: SAMCalculationReport
Report.description: This report calculates Standard Allowed Minutes (SAM) for operations.

Report.name: WorkerStrengthReport
Report.description: This report provides information about worker productivity and performance.

Report.name: CuttingTagInitDetail
Report.description: This report displays bundle-wise and part-wise tag numbers that have been initialized within a specified date range and filters.

Report.name: CuttingWorkOrderDateWiseWIP
Report.displayName: Cutting Work Order Date Wise WIP Report
Report.description: This report provides a detailed view of Work-In-Progress (WIP) status for cutting operations, organized by date and work order.

Report.name: CuttingWorkOrderWIP
Report.description: This report provides a summary view of Work-In-Progress (WIP) status for cutting operations, aggregated by work order.

Report.name: CuttingBundleWiseDetail
Report.description: This report provides detailed information about cutting bundles, organized by line and cutting issuance data.

Report.name: CuttingDateWiseCutting
Report.description: This report provides detailed information about cutting operations organized by date.

Report.name: QualityCheckReport
Report.description: This report provides detailed information about quality checks performed on garments.

Report.name: InlineRFTReport
Report.description: This report provides detailed information about inline RFT processes.

Report.name: HourlyProductionEndline
Report.description: This report provides detailed information about inline RFT processes.
